root: ^[EON] Well done mortal. I haven't had a break like this in 13792 years. I am truly in your debt.
^Now will you release the souls of my people?

g-1: ^[EON] I can grant you and your people passage back to the overworld, but I must get back to work, and thus it is your responsibility to collect their souls from the depths.
g-2: ^[EON] I will transport you to the chamber where they are held. You must collect their souls without interfering with any of my minions. For they will see you as a threat, and I cannot garantuee their cooperation.
g-3: ^[EON] Click on each soul to collect them but beware of the angelic guards. Clicking on them will only anger them. They will increase in size and move faster. Good luck. Farewell, friend.
